func.title: PlayerControl

param.name: player
param.desc: Number of the player who pressed the control.

param.name: control
param.desc: Number of the pressed control, defined as a CON_ constant via PlayerControls.txt.

param.name: control_extra
param.desc: Optional id defined with ExtraData in PlayerControls.txt.

param.name: strength
param.desc: Current strength of the control. For key presses: 0 or 100. For analog stick or trigger movement (state = CONS_Moved): 0 to PLRCON_MaxStrength.

param.name: repeated
param.desc: Whether the call is generated because of a held button.

param.name: state
param.desc:
State of the key press. Possible values:
Constant Description
CONS_Down Key has been pressed down.
CONS_Up Key has been released. Only generated for held keys.
CONS_Moved An analog control on a gamepad has been moved. Only generated for held keys.

func.desc: Called globally for each control command by players. See Player Controls.
